Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Yesterday was surprisingly good on Oak Hill and Beach Alley.  Skied in tracks covered with several inches of snow.  A few leaves and twigs popping up.  Good glide.  A blue kinda day.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: Skiing is awesome with a 24" base of natural snow and daily power tilling.  All trails are open.  Save $20 on race registration by registering online at SKIREG.com by 10 pm tonight!

nubsNob.liftsOpen: All 8 chairlifts, conveyor and the rope tow.
nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails will be power-tilled and tracked this morning. There is a classic race on the upper Red at 10 a.m. this morning.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Special night skiing session this Sunday from 5:30 to 9:00 p.m.
nubsNob.comments: The skiers paradise continues at Nub's Nob. A bit of fresh snow overnight and continued snowfall today should make for excellent conditions. NASTAR racing is open to the public at 12:30 on Birch Run. Pintail Peak Lodge is open with food and an espresso bar. The soup of the day is polish sausage with sauerkraut. The lifts will spin from 9:00 a.m. to 9:00 p.m. with an hour break at 4:30 to groom for night skiing. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
